title: India 8-0 Pakistan: Rohit Sharma's Men Keep ODI World Cup Dominance Intact
description: IND vs PAK World Cup 2023 Highlights: India maintained the clean sheet over Pakistan in the ODI World Cup history with a seven-wicket win over the side in Ahmedabad on Saturday

title: "Hostages In Areas That Hamas Knows We'll Bomb": Israel's Ex Top Adviser
description: Hamas' attack on Israel is the worst attack on Jews since the holocaust and the Palestinian group is deliberately keeping hostages in places where it knows Israel would carry out bombings so that they would be killed, the country's former national se

title: Islamic Nations' Group Calls "Urgent, Extraordinary" Meet On Israel-Gaza
description: A top grouping of Islamic nations has called an "urgent extraordinary meeting" in Saudi Arabia to discuss the Israel-Gaza war.

title: Israeli Man Claims Tesla EV Saved Him From Hamas Gunmen. Elon Musk Reacts
description: A man in Israel managed to outrun over a dozen armed Hamas operatives in his Tesla EV in a dramatic chase involving gunshots and bullets being pumped into his legs, hands, and skull and lived to tell his tale.

title: No Guard Of Honour For Agniveer? Army Explains After Huge Row In Punjab
description: The opposition parties in Punjab on Saturday expressed shock over the Army not giving a guard of honour during the last rites of Agniveer Amritpal Singh who died in Jammu and Kashmir on October 11.

title: "If Want To Live In India, Have To Say Bharat Mata Ki Jai": Union Minister
description: Union Minister Kailash Choudhary on Saturday asserted that those who want to live in India should say 'Bharat Mata ki Jai'.

title: Best Friend Killed By Hamas, Man Recalls "Run For Life" During Israel Fest
description: More than 250 people were gunned down or burnt in their cars by Hamas gunmen at a music festival in Israel last week in the deadliest, single assault on civilians in the country's history.

title: Residents Flee From Bombed Out Gaza As Israel Steps Up Attack: 10 Points
description: Thousands of Palestinians sought refuge on Saturday after Israel warned them to evacuate the northern Gaza Strip before an expected ground offensive against Hamas, one week on from the deadliest terror attack in Israeli history.

title: Opinion: Daily Despatch: Hamas Trying To Prevent Civilians In Gaza From Fleeing
description: Seven days after Hamas launched its attack on Israel, the militant movement in Gaza is now also challenged by its own population.

title: "Awful, Catastrophic Truth...": Arab-Israeli News Anchor On Hamas Attack
description: A Muslim news anchor's message during a newscast condemning the Hamas' brutal terror attack on Israel as barbaric, inhumane, and un-Islamic is now viral.

title: "More Is Coming": Israel PM Netanyahu Meets Troops On Gaza Border
description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu told troops near the Gaza border Saturday "more is coming" in Israel's response to Hamas's shock attack last week, according to a video released by his office.

title: "Israel-Gaza Conflict Could Impact World GDP": IMF's Gita Gopinath
description: The Israel-Gaza war can have "important consequences" on the global economy, especially since it has come at a time when many countries across the world are fighting inflation, the International Monetary Fund's Gita Gopinath has said.

title: Man Recorded Wife's Phone Calls Without Permission. What Court Said
description: The Chhattisgarh High Court has ruled that recording the mobile phone conversation of a person without her knowledge amounts to the violation of the right to privacy under Article 21 and set aside a family court's order.

title: AI May Lead To Flattening Of Pay Structure: IMF's Gita Gopinath
description: In an exclusive interview with NDTV in Marrakech, the International Monetary Fund's Gita Gopinath spoke about the macroeconomic stability in India, the headwinds in China and the impact AI and extreme weather events will have on the global economy.

title: Kill As Many, Take Hostages, Hamas Told In "Top Secret" Document: Report
description: The Hamas group created detailed plans to target elementary schools and a youth centre in the Israeli kibbutz of Kfar Sa'ad to "kill as many people as possible", hold hostages and quickly take them into the Gaza Strip, documents showed, NBC reported.

title: "Very Disappointed": Pak Great Blasts Babar And Co After Collapse vs India
description: India bundled out Pakistan for just 191 during the Cricket World Cup 2023 match in Ahmedabad on Saturday.

title: US Move To Benefit Tens Of Thousands Of Indians Waiting For Green Cards
description: The US has announced it will provide employment authorisation cards to some non-immigrant categories, including those waiting for green cards, for five years, a move that would benefit tens of thousands of Indians living in the country.

title: "Thanda...": Sachin's Payback To Akhtar's Trolling Post Pakistan Thrashing
description: India vs Pakistan: A clinical bowling effort saw India dismissing Pakistan for 191 in a World Cup 2023 match. In reply, Rohit Sharma and Shreyas Iyer registered half-centuries as India reached the target in just 30.3 overs

title: WC 2023 Points Table: How Victory Against Pakistan Massively Boosts India
description: World Cup Points Table: India defeated Pakistan by seven wickets in a crucial Cricket World Cup 2023 match.
